CatDescriptText: Mr. Nicholas Stepanovic, college student, 3008 Mary Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 1, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think that 18-year-olds should be given the privilege of voting?" answer reads: "I don't think so. Most are not familiar with politics, and most are not interested."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Nicholas Stepanovic wearing light colored short sleeved shirt and eyeglasses, standing outside of Jenkins Arcade, Thrift Drugs in background, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
